reviewtext: I loved this so much that I actually got a second one.  It has plenty of plugs for all the "stuff" associated with a TV, and several plugs that are spaced far enough apart to accommodate the "wall warts."  Using this cable I was able to consolidate from 2 extension cables to one.  I am assuming the power is "clean" as it's advertised, as I've no way to check it.  Certainly a contender in this market.  Having the plugs labeled is a nice touch as well.
